      • isUseParentPaint

        public boolean isUseParentPaint()
        是否使用父类的绘制实现方法，true表示是.

        因为在BE LNF中，进度条和背景都是使用N9图，没法通过设置JProgressBar的背景色和前景 色来控制进度条的颜色，本方法的目的就是当用户设置了进度条的Background或Foreground 时告之本实现类不使用BE LNF中默认的N9图填充绘制而改用父类中的方法（父类中的方法 就可以支持颜色的设置罗，只是丑点，但总归是能适应用户的需求场景要求，其实用户完全可以 通过JProgressBar.setUI(new MetalProgressBar())方式来自定义进度的UI哦）.

        指定者:
        isUseParentPaint 在接口中 BeautyEyeLNFHelper.__UseParentPaintSurported
        返回:
        true, if is use parent paint

      • paintDeterminate

        protected void paintDeterminate(java.awt.Graphics g,
                    javax.swing.JComponent c)
        All purpose paint method that should do the right thing for almost all linear, determinate progress bars. By setting a few values in the defaults table, things should work just fine to paint your progress bar. Naturally, override this if you are making a circular or semi-circular progress bar.
        覆盖:
        paintDeterminate 在类中 javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicProgressBarUI
        参数:
        g - the g
        c - the c
        从以下版本开始:
        1.4
        另请参阅:
        paintIndeterminate(java.awt.Graphics, javax.swing.JComponent)

      • paintIndeterminate

        protected void paintIndeterminate(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      javax.swing.JComponent c)
        All purpose paint method that should do the right thing for all linear bouncing-box progress bars. Override this if you are making another kind of progress bar.
        覆盖:
        paintIndeterminate 在类中 javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicProgressBarUI
        参数:
        g - the g
        c - the c
        从以下版本开始:
        1.4
        另请参阅:
        paintDeterminate(java.awt.Graphics, javax.swing.JComponent)

      • paintProgressBarContentImpl

        protected void paintProgressBarContentImpl(boolean isHorizontal,
                               java.awt.Graphics g,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int amountFull,
                               int barContentRectHeight,
                               int barSumHeightForVertival)
        进度条当前值的绘制实现方法.
        参数:
        isHorizontal - true表示水平进度条，否则表示垂直进度条
        g - the g
        x - the x
        y - the y
        amountFull - the amount full
        barContentRectHeight - the bar content rect height
        barSumHeightForVertival - 本参数只在垂直进度条时有意义，目的是为了在当前值很 小的情况下为了达到N9图最小绘制高度时，作修正时需要

      • paintProgressBarBgImpl

        barRectWidth - the bar rect width
        barRectHeight - the bar rect height
